title: Hey I'm new
body: Yo! Well, I want to be able to post and comment, how can I level up? Im so confused. Thanks I'm a noob sorry!!!!

replies.body: Thanks y'all! I appreciate the answers!

Because you're new, you probably hadn't posted on the boards in a while. When this happens, your Boards and Summoner profiles will fall out of sync. This discussion post was enough to cause a resync to happen, so your level has been updated on your Boards Profile now.

Let me know if you have any further issues with posting.

your level is the same as your in-game level
it's just that boards will require you to make a post in order for the boards to sync your info with the game server and pull the info it requires.
